scripts.dev: bun run clean && bun run generate-icons && bun build --watch --target browser src/content/twitter.ts --outdir=dist/content && bun build --watch --target browser src/background/index.ts --outdir=dist/background && bun build --watch --target browser src/popup/popup.ts --outdir=dist/popup
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.start: bun run build && echo 'Extension built! Load it in Chrome from the dist/ directory'
